 3.0.01  SPECIFIC ENTRY REQUIREMENTS AND OTHER INFORMATION FOR INDIVIDUAL POLYTECHNICS AND MONOTECHNICS.  
  
  
A. FEDERAL POLYTECHNIC, AUCHI  Entry 
Requirements:  
Five (5) SSCE Credit passes at a sitting or Six (6) Credit passes at two (2) sittings in subjects relevant to the proposed course of study.  
  
  
PROGRAMMES AVAILABLE AT THE NATIONAL DIPLOMA (ND) AND ENTRY REQUIREMENTS
